page.title: 08GAMES PLAYED BY CHILDREN
page.content: Conkers: Two players try to smash their opponents conker which is tied on a piece of string. British Bull Dog: One person stands in the middle of the playground, all the other children try to run from one side to the other, if they are caught they join the person in the middle, when all are caught the game is over. 52 Bunker: A form of hide and seek. One child counts to 52 while the rest hide. The idea is to get back to the "Bunker" without being seen by the person seeking. Other games played are Marbles, Skipping, Football, Cricket, Netball, and Hockey.
